column2: Noble Energy posts loss amid crude price slumpUPDATE 2-Noble to make investment decision on Israel's gas fields in 1 yr * Shares rise as much as 8 pct   (Adds details on Noble's Israeli assets)  UPDATE 2-Noble to make investment decision on Israel's gas fields in 1 yr * Shares rise as much as 8 pct   (Adds details on Noble's Israeli assets) Nov 2 Oil and gas producer Noble Energy Inc  posted a quarterly net loss
column3: compared with a profit a year earlier

UPDATE 6-Visa to buy Visa Europe in deal worth as much as $23 bln Nov 2 Visa Inc said on Monday it would buy former subsidiary Visa Europe Ltd for up to $23.3 billion in a deal that will give the world's largest payments network a chance to cut costs over the long term and raise fees in the second-biggest card market. * Visa shares down 3.4 pct   (Adds Breakingviews; Updates shares)UPDATE 6-Visa to buy Visa Europe in deal worth as much as $23 bln Nov 2 Visa Inc said on Monday it would buy former subsidiary Visa Europe Ltd for up to $23.3 billion in a deal that will give the world's largest payments network a chance to cut costs over the long term and raise fees in the second-biggest card market. UPDATE 6-Visa to buy Visa Europe in deal worth as much as $23 bln Nov 2 Visa Inc said on Monday it would buy former subsidiary Visa Europe Ltd for up to $23.3 billion in a deal that will give the world's largest payments network a chance to cut costs over the long term and raise fees in the second-biggest card market. * Visa shares down 3.4 pct   (Adds Breakingviews; Updates shares)UPDATE 6-Visa to buy Visa Europe in deal worth as much as $23 bln Nov 2 Visa Inc said on Monday it would buy former subsidiary Visa Europe Ltd for up to $23.3 billion in a deal that will give the world's largest payments network a chance to cut costs over the long term and raise fees in the second-biggest card market.
